评论详情: The material is a nice dick comfortable material pockets are great bought separately, but from the same vendor, love the comfortability

I ordered a size M.  I am 5'4, 132 lbs.  The fabric is soft, light weight.  NOT a winter sweatpant, but I will wear them hanging out indoors.  The blue is a pretty color.  The length hits exactly at my ankle.  I don't think I'll be putting these in the dryer.  Concern for shrinkage.
I have purchased these in so many colors, they are so comfortable and cute!
Great! Comfortable, didn’t shrink when washed- awesome joggers/light sweats!
A light, flexible, and very comfortable sweatpant. I’m very satisfied

These joggers are so soft and comfy!  I love the cotton with modal, which makes them smooth with a nice drape!  I’ve ordered other cotton ones that feel stiff and look cheap…not these.  I also love the wide waistband, which is so comfortable and non-restrictive.  These feel like high quality joggers, and I would say are true to size.  I’m planning on ordering a second pair!
I really love these pants
Nice quality and nice color. The fabric is very soft and they are so comfortable
These joggers were super soft and comfortable. They looked good on—not too baggy.

Total mis representation. when asked directly if it was a sold as set of pants and a top here was their response: (copied from the site) "Yes, it is a set of pants and a top. According to the product description, this is a two-piece lounge set featuring a long sleeve pullover top and sweatpants made of a soft and stretchy fabric..." Many reviews had the same problem of thinking they were getting a complete set. Fabric is flimsy
I like that these are more of a french terry rather than a fleece, which can get hot.  True to size and very comfortable.
The color is pale black! Not as dark as id like

I ordered these in size Medium in white and black. I’d say they run a little big. The medium is pretty roomy and I’m at the upper edge of medium. They’re about the same size as Vuori large joggers. They’re a nice material, nice medium weight, very comfortable. I’m returning the white because they’re completely see through.

Not worth buying. The elastic inside the waist isn't attached to the fabric and twists and folds and bunches in there to the point you can't wear it. It's hard to fix and I haven't Bern able to without significant effort and not able to fix most time. I've given up. They are also cut weird. And if you care about energy everything I've bought from the drop is literally horrible energy which affects you and weakens your aura and spiritual strength. It must be made in horrendous conditions. I ended up returning else everything from the drop but I wish I hadn't kept this.  Of everything I've ever bought from Amazon this is the worst thing I've kept.

评论概述: Weird fabric - not consistent with others
评论详情: I have two pairs of pants from this company and the fabric textures are very different. These rust-colored ones are much heavier than the slate blue ones I bought. So it’s, I  guess, not a note about these pants but about this company having inconsistent fabrics on the same style.  Odd

评论概述: Lo único es la talla. Me quedo grande.
评论详情: Bello, suave, buena calidad. Solo que debí pedir una talla menos. Corre grande
Love these perfect fit

I like these as far as fit, feel, style and comfort. I tried on and immediately ordered 2 more pairs all in Black. I purchased on January 11th and it's January 29th today. They are so faded! They look as if I have had them 10+ years. I take care of my black clothes, Dark Colors Woollight for washing and low dryer setting. These will be going in the trash. Maybe the other lighter colors would be fine but do not purchase the Black if you are looking to get even 6 months out of them.
These are great black sweatpants. They fit true to size and have a good amount of stretch. They are a great athleisure staple.
Great joggers!
They are very comfortable to wear the color is very pretty
I love these joggers. They feel so good against skin. Excellent purchase.

I’ve never bought pants or joggers from Amazon, so I wasn’t really sure about these. I am so happy I got them. They are so soft and so comfortable, honestly my new favorite joggers. I will be ordering more. They fit well and are made with a good quality material.
These sweat pants are soft and comfortable. The only thing I would change is the thickness of the elastic. But true to size and warm.

I love these joggers, from the fabric to the fit to the feel. According to the size chart, I should order the 3X, but they were too roomy. The 2X fit perfectly. I have these in a few colors, even duplicate colors. Please bring more back in stocks in all the colors size 2X.
I’m wearing it right now.  It is now my favourite thing to wear to run errands in.  Always feel put together.

I have a few pairs of these in small and i like them but i’m very petite (5’1” - 90lbs) so they end up being baggy and loose fitting. I ordered these in XXS hoping they would be a slim fit but alas, they’re identical in size to my regular smalls. Comfortable and soft material, but I’ll probably only wear them around the house or as pjs.
Great quality and perfect fit.
well made, thick and comfy  the orange color was ugly

Theses are advertised as super soft! Maybe they become super soft after washing but they are not soft on arrival. I was expecting sweatpants these are not sweatpants, at least not what I consider sweatpants. They are a thick heavy material. They’re not warm, soft or cozy like traditional sweatpants. They were not what I was expecting so I returned them.

I’m 5’5” 140 lbs and the small floats around my waist like a Large. The oversized makes them looks frumpy so I don’t wear them Definitely size down 1-2 sizes. Other than that, beautiful and soft exterior but a little rough on the inside.
Very soft material.  Bought matching top and color is the same.  True red.  Washes nice also.

评论概述: Not the quality I expected for the price
评论详情: Thought I bought these with the "try before you buy" at $19.99 in sale. Turns out I paid $31 and some change. They are a decent fabric, but very light and only a little bit nicer than the $15 matching sweatshirt I bought from shein. The waist band does the thing where the elastic inside rolls up inside and it never sits right. They look decent enough, but for the price, go with the Amazon basic sweatpants and I think you will be happier.
True to size. I wear to my PT classes.  Warm!

Got these for my daughter. They’re definitely more of a maroon type of red, than a standard red, but she’s enjoying them! We were looking for something that was a classic red for her school club. If that’s what you’re looking for too, don’t purchase this color. Other than that, they’re great!
Love the sweatpants. excellent quality washes well.
Love these joggers. They are not fleece but terry cloth inside. None the less they match my shirt

Yes, according to the youtube fashion police, this jogger look is almost out of style.  I've heard sizing up for a baggier fit is more on-trend.  I'm 5'6" and 130 lbs, wearing the size Small.  Maybe I should have tried a Medium?  Acckk, whatever!  I wear what I want!  hahaYou'll love the amazing, soft, warm material on these joggers.  The waistband is flat, so no extra bulk in the mid-region.  The pockets are deep enough to fit your xxl phone.  This is a quality piece of clothing.
Comfort and great fit
These fit me perfectly and are so comfortable. I am short and the length is spot on.
Very comfortable and lightweight.

Love these pants! I am 5’10” 142 lbs and I got a size medium and they fit perfect! The length is just above ankle for me just like pictured. Nice material and I got the white and they’re not totally see through! They have a good thickness but not heavy. Great purchase!

They fit great, so comfortable. These feel like they are expensive, bought 2 pairs great colors. Had bought big for hanging out around house so bought 4x but I normally wear a 2x next time I will buy a 3x, but even though bigger than I wanted ( just want baggy fit), I still love them. I weigh 200lbs and am 5 10'. Wish they had the tops to match in stock in 3x I would buy them too.
The waistband on these sweatpants twists after a couple of washes. Unfortunately, I am past my window for returning them so I am stuck with a pair of sweatpants that are not comfortable at the waist.

评论概述: Super soft, love the color & fit perfectly!
评论详情: I purchased the Amazon Essentials brand last year in a similar color. They were super long and I was always cuffing them or pulling them up. The Drop had a great sale and I loved the orange color! They are so soft and warm. They have pockets and the drawstring actually holds the pants in place. I love the brighter color ( the picture shows the Amazon Essentials compared to the brighter colored Drop ones. The length is great, excellent give and stretch. I definitely will be purchasing other colors.

评论概述: Love these pants but the elastic waist is always getting twisted
评论详情: The fit and comfort of the pants are A+, but the elastic waist is always getting twisted. Taking off two stars for that as it affects the look and comfort!

评论概述: This is my go to for style and comfort, just great.
评论详情: This is soo soft... so comfortable, and cute. Highly recommend..

These are the nicest, softest, most comfy joggers I’ve ever had. The material is thick and good quality, doesn’t pill, and doesn’t get baggy. The downside is that they are longer than they look on the images, so they don’t have the stylish shorter hem (I have longer than average legs, and these are fully to my ankle). The real bummer, though, is the very foldy elastic band. From the first time I tried them on, I could tell it would be an issue. It isn’t secured in the waistband and readily rolls and folds while on or in the wash. I may try to stitch it myself because I otherwise love these and highly recommend them!
I liked the product. It is a nice fit and very comfortable
Nice, soft, comfortable, thick fabric.  Great neutral color.  I should not have sized up.  The 4x was huge for me.  I’m exchanging for a 3x which I’m sure will still be roomy.

So happy I found XXS pants for my daughter. This size is hard to come by and they fit great. These are not too baggy but are not tight either, they are the perfect fit for confort and style. She wears these to school and loves how comfortable they are. Bought in two colors on Prime Deal days.
Got these on Prime Day and so glad I did!  They are my favorite sweats now!  They are light weight and I love that.  They are high quality and beautifully made with attention to details!  Love them!
I was looking for a light weight jogger with pockets. These check all the boxes. They are comfy and cozy yet not too heavy. I would definitely recommend. 👍🏼 👍🏼

Soft, comfy, and roomy! I wear a 32 and the 5x is extremely comfortable. I am 5'4" and 27 inch inseam is usually perfect for me, but these are so long more like for a tall person. I wish the made petite or cropped version. Hopefully they continue to make more because plus size clothing is hard to find

I was a little worried because the color looks more orange, and I was hoping for a burnt orange or rust.  However, I must say I love these joggers.  They are comfy, fit well, and wash easy (delicate cycle, cold-water) in place in the dryer (low heat).  They are nice enough to wear with a t-shirt and blue jean jacket as well. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.  Just couldn't find the sweat top in the photo to match. For reference, I am 5' 7" and the length is perfect.

评论概述: size runs a bit on the larger side
评论详情: nice soft fabric, perfect for all weather

评论概述: Super comfy fabric & nice fit  … but the elastic waist band ..
评论详情: Update: the elastic band really bothers me - won’t buy again. Always needs adjusting. Ugh … otherwise washed well and great fit. 😢  The elastic band itself puckers.. probably because it is not stitched down and twists within. The edges of the tag is annoyingly pokey but will prob be fine after wash. I’m 5’3” and these are full length on me.
Every day
I bought these during prime days. They're a good medium weight and the length works for my 5'7" frame. They're very comfortable. I use them as pajama bottoms.
Great value.  Very soft and cute.  Can’t wait to wear them.

5'6 130 lbs ordered small, my normal size.  My biggest problem with these is they're not nicely tapered at the bottom like they are in the pictures. The bottom cuff is nice but there's so much extra fabric gathered above the cuff. Really giving harem pants at the bottom.  Conversely, they're pretty snug in the butt/ crotch/ thighs for joggers. The outline of the pockets is clearly visible due to them being so snug on my thighs.  I like the material, but the fit is all wrong for joggers. I saw that another reviewer had the same complaints about a new pair they got vs an older pair they had. Did they change the pattern or did I just get a poorly made pair? Like the actual seams and everything are fine it just seems like a different garment than shown.  Confused. Sad. Oh well 🤷‍♀️ I got them for $10 on prime day so I'm considering keeping them for around the house as long as the butt/thigh area loosens up since I do like the material. They want like $30-40 for these usually though? When you might not really get the garment shown?? Idk. I guess returns are easy. Good luck if you gamble on these!
Great material, comfortable- nice fit. I purchased during prime days and wish I would have bought several

评论概述: Comfy, don’t believe Amazon’s size suggestion!
评论详情: These pants felt super comfy and looked cute however they were huge. I normally would’ve ordered a small, but Amazon “recommended” a medium. I bought them on prime day, they don’t fit, and now for me to buy in a small size it’s 4x as much money 😞 exchanging wasn’t an option, such a bummer!

I ordered these joggers for the first time after looking at reviews ….  I ordered two colors and loved the colors when I saw them just today but then opened the second pair of joggers and although they’re both the SAME SIZE … one is much much bigger !! How could that even happen and of course yet it did and I’m very disappointed about this. Think twice before ordering different colors !

Great pants. I sized up but didn’t really need to. I am 5’7 140 lbs. I got a large and they are so comfy and cute. I wish I could get the pink ones but they are sold out. Bought the off white and red.

I now own 2 colors of these joggers and they are almost perfect.  The only issue I have with them is the elastic band folds over itself.  Besides that, they are the perfect length, perfect red and navy colors and perfect weight for where I live.

评论概述: Great if you've got a booty.
评论详情: I wear a size 18/XXL and have a large booty and thick thighs and joggers are usually more like leggings on me. These are great, they are baggy in the right places but don't look huge. They feel a lot like my husband's jogger sweatpants from Lulu (that I take all the time). My only caution is that if you are buying them for a matching set with the hoodie the browns are slightly off. Not terrible, but definitely off.
I wish I could find a sweatshirt that matches

评论概述: Supposed to work as a set, but colors don’t match
评论详情: I wanted to love this, but the sweatshirt and joggers are clearly two different colors.  They are soft, and comfortable, but I was looking for a set.  Sadly, going back.
These fit well. I’m 5’6” 153. I bought a large. I like the color and style
These aren’t super heavy, are true to size, are super comfortable, and wash and dry great. 20/10 recommend.
Comfortable soft true to size

These are absolutely the cutest and most comfortable joggers! I ordered an XXL and think and XL would fit me a little better. However, I’m NOT going to return them because the XLs are out of stock! I’m keeping these in my favorites and will pray they stock them again.  I’d say they are pretty TTS. If you want them looser, size up
I have purchased at least 5 pairs over the past several years. Perfect fit and length.

I ordered extra extra small In light blue. I am 4’11” and weigh 85 pounds and they fit really well. The fabric was incredibly soft and I liked everything about these pants until I washed them. Something happened to the elastic in the waistband in the back and it doubled over and could not be straightened out. I’m going to try and see if I can return them because I bought them at full price and now they are at 55% off.

I wanted to like these shorts but the elastic at the waist keeps folding and moving around in the channel of fabric.  It also does it when the shorts come out of the wash so I have to massage the elastic with my fingers to get it to lay flat again and hang dry so that it kind of stays where it should.  Aggravating! I wouldn't buy this again.  The shorts have the same problem 😩 I bought this in red and black so it was a waste of money.  Ugh!Plus I just noticed a hole in the fabric of the leg.... into the trash this goes!
They’re wonderful.  This red makes me look like Santa. Jungle bells all the way!
loved these so much I bought a second pair.  They are not too heavy and the perfect weight to wear around the house or on a road trip

评论概述: Soft, lightweight and fit true to size.
评论详情: I’m really liking this set. I got the top and pants in red and the shorts and top in brown. These are super lightweight, good quality and so comfortable. Perfect for cool summer evenings and fall days.

评论概述: The pink is not as it appears
评论详情: I wanted a medium pink color. This is fuschia. The fabric is very thick and not very soft. I’m pretty disappointed for what I expected.

I absolutely love these joggers.  I've purchased more than a few pairs in the last few years, but nearly every one of them has a curling waste band.  It must not be sewed in, as even after the first wash, it starts to curl.  It's disappointing, and I wish the manufacturers would take note.  Sew in the waste band please!
I ordered the white and they were so comfortable, but they were see through.  I am going to keep them to wear around the house, but I don’t feel comfortable going out in public with them

评论概述: More comfortable and flattering than many other joggers
评论详情: I compared these to several other joggers, I’m including some high end options, and these were the winners. They were comfy and flattering.
These are the best joggers I’ve come across in awhile. They fit well, have usable pockets and the material is so soft. I will definitely be buying more.

Bought these to go with drop shoulder short sleeve mock neck T-shirt. Both the “Drop” brand. Love them both. Medium weight and wash well in cold water. I hung mine to dry, not one wrinkle. Bit pricey for sweats but so worth the price.
Love the softness of the pants but one wash ruined the extra wide elastic waistband.

These joggers are the best. They fit as expected (I’m 5’7, 145 pounds, 8 weeks post partum and got a medium) and are SO soft. The quality of the fabric is so great, they feel like an expensive luxury brand. Def buy! I am buying more colors for sure.

评论用户: Buen producto es lo que necesitaba.
评论详情: Buen material abrigable. Bonitos colores

评论概述: Nice material but way too small
评论详情: I'm normally a L in pants, and these fit too snug. More like a legging than a semi fitted jogger.
These are great joggers. I will style like the were styled in the listing. Great for travel.
Soft and comfy!
soooooo so so so comfortable. I need every color!! These are incredibly comfy, sizing is accurate I’m 135lbs 5’4 and wearing a small
Very comfortable,  fits well, good looking and excellent quality.
Good material but run large, especially for a 5’2” woman.

I initially loved these joggers as they fit great and were exactly what I was looking for. The fabric is incredibly smooth and soft, and the cut is just right - not too long or too short. However, after a few times in the wash, I started encountering an issue. The waistband keeps rolling over, and it becomes a hassle to keep fixing it throughout the day. This has been a bit frustrating, as I expected the waistband to stay in place better.
Love this set. Material is so comfortable.  And hangs nice.
Cotton blend that is not breathable.
I love a world where sweatpants are acceptable daily attire. These are great.

The color is pretty, two stars for that. There is no way I am trying those pants on! Nasty! The joggers arrived with water-like stains in the crotch area and on the upper thigh area. Additionally, there is a brown/orange stain about 4 inches down from the water stains. Gross. Really freaking gross. I have lost count of the number of “used” items I have received over the past 6 mos! What is going on?! Where is the quality assurance?! Lack of packaging care, used and damaged items, shipping delays when we pay for Prime benefits (and it isn’t the carriers, other stores-same carriers are arriving on time).
Lounging around the house.  So comfortable
